_header: Salue I say holy face of our Saviour
Subjects: hymns, to Christ; Christ, hymns to
_description: John Audelay, ‘Salutacio in honore saluatoris’ — four 6-line stanzas

BodDou302.First Lines:
Salue I say hole face of our saueourIn þe wyche schynþt
                    to vs an heuenly fygure…
BodDou302.Last Lines:
…& grant vs al þi merce in heuen to haue aplasTo fore
                    þi iugement
BodDou302.Attributed Title:
Quicumque hanc salutacionem in honore saluatoris per xx dies continuo
                        deuote dixerit bonefacius quartus concessit omnibus vere confessis et
                        contritis plenam remissionem omnium peccatorum et hoc scriptum est apud
                        Romam in ecclesia sancti petri coram altate saluatoris (f.
                        27va)
BodDou302.Editions:
Whiting,  Ella Keats,
                        ed.  
             John Audelay: The Poems.
EETS
         o.s. 184 (1931); repr. 1988: 179-80.
